mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY emp_id, sct_cd) AS rowNum, emp_id, sct_cd, sct_sts_cd, rgtr_id, reg_dt, mdfr_id, mdfcn_dt FROM tb_sct_lst WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND sct_cd = #{sctCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sct_lst ( emp_id, sct_cd, sct_sts_cd, rgtr_id, reg_dt, mdfr_id, mdfcn_dt ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{sctCd}, #{sctStsCd}, #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{mdfrId}, NOW() )
mapper.update:

sct_sts_cd = #{sctStsCd},
